New Records: Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan became the first pair to register three century stands in T20 World Cup history.
Key Match Events: Pakistan won the match by 7 wickets.
Wicket of Glenn Phillips off Shaheen Afridi.
Devon Conway dismissed via run-out by Shadab Khan.
Kane Williamson dismissed by Afridi after scoring 46 off 42.
Finn Allen dismissed by Afridi on review.
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand opted to bat first after winning the toss.
Six out of seven games have been won by teams batting first at the SCG.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan's win marked their first finals appearance in the T20 World Cup.
The victory was a significant turnaround for Pakistan after their early exits.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The SCG holds historical memories for New Zealand, including their win over Australia in the Super 12s.
Tim Southee, a veteran bowler, played a key role in New Zealand's bowling.
Others: Use of reviews by both teams during the match.
